data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Roszkowska, Milena, Stec, Daniel, Ciobanu, Daniel Adrian, Kaczmarek, Łukasz (2016): Tardigrades from Nahuel Huapi National Park (Argentina, South America) with descriptions of two new Macrobiotidae species. Zootaxa 4105 (3): 243-260, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4105.3.2
